title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: NEAR Drops 7.4% as Index Declines Over Weekend
summary: Avalanche (AVAX) joined Near Protocol (NEAR) as an underperformer, also falling 7.4%.
author: CoinDesk Indices
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2699.5, down 2.9% (-80.53) since 4 p.m. ET on Friday.

Three of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: SUI (+0.7%) and LTC (+0.7%).

Laggards: NEAR (-7.4%) and AVAX (-7.4%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index declined 2.9% with more assets falling than rising, and two major cryptocurrencies dropping 7.4% each.
